description: The user right-clicked on the desktop.
outcome: A context menu opened, revealing options like "Arrange Icons By", "Refresh", "Paste", "New", and "Properties".  The mouse cursor, now a white arrow with a blue box, hovers over the "Properties" option.

description: The user clicked the highlighted "Properties" option in the desktop context menu. As a result, the context menu closed.
outcome: The context menu disappeared. A "Display Properties" window is about to open.

description: The user clicked on the "Screen Saver" tab at the top of the "Display Properties" window. As a result, the window's content switched from the "Themes" tab to the "Screen Saver" tab.
outcome: The user switched to the "Screen Saver" tab within a larger window or dialog. This tab allows customizing the screensaver type, wait time, and related settings. The previously visible "Theme" section and its associated controls are no longer present.

description: The user clicked the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
outcome: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu expanded, showing a list of available screensavers.

description: The user clicked on the "None" option in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
outcome: The screen saver wait time changed from 10 minutes to 1 minute, and the dropdown menu closed, indicating "None" was selected as the screensaver.

description: The user clicked the "Power..." button within the "Display Properties" window's "Screen Saver" tab. This action resulted in the "Power Options Properties" window appearing.
outcome: The appearance of the "Power Options Properties" window partially obscures the "Display Properties" window.  The mouse cursor changes to an hourglass, indicating system activity.

description: The user clicked on the "Turn off monitor" option's dropdown menu.
outcome: The "Turn off monitor" option's dropdown menu expanded to display a list of time options, with the currently selected option being "After 20 mins".

event: The mouse clicked on After 5 hours.
description: The user clicked on "Never" in the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu within the "Power Options Properties" window.
outcome: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu closed, and "Never" became the selected option.

description: The user clicked the "OK" button in the "Power Options Properties" window.  As a result, the "Power Options Properties" window closed.
outcome: The "Power Options Properties" window closed, revealing the previously obscured "Display Properties" window beneath it.

description: The user clicked the "OK" button at the bottom of the "Display Properties" window, closing the window.
